description: number of likes for each interacted user, 2 by default. It can be a number (e.g. 2) or a range (e.g. 2-4)
limit on total amount of likes during the session, 300 by default
number of interactions per each blogger, 70 by default. It can be a number (e.g. 70) or a range (e.g. 60-80). Only successful interactions count
repeat the same session again after N minutes after completion, disabled by default. It can be a number of minutes (e.g. 180) or a range (e.g. 120-180)
set working hours to the script, disabled by default. It can be a number presenting specific hour (e.g. 13) or a range (e.g. 9-21)
follow given percentage of interacted users, 0 by default
limit on amount of follows during interaction with each one user's followers, disabled by default
limit on total amount of follows during the session, disabled by default

unfollow at most given number of users. Only users followed by this script will be unfollowed. The order
                        is from oldest to newest followings. It can be a number (e.g. 100) or a range (e.g. 100-200)

unfollow at most given number of users, that don't follow you back. Only users followed by this script
                        will be unfollowed. The order is from oldest to newest followings. It can be a number (e.g. 100) or a range (e.g. 100-200)
unfollow at most given number of users. The order is from oldest to newest followings. It can be a number (e.g. 100) or a range (e.g. 100-200)
minimum amount of followings, after reaching this amount unfollow stops
device identifier. Should be used only when multiple devices are connected at once
add this flag to use an old version of uiautomator. Use it only if you experience problems with the default version
script goes through your followers list, checks each user's profile and removes those who has more than 1000 followings. It will at most remove N users as provided
add this argument to remove only those who has more than 2000 followings. 1000 is simply a default value
list of usernames with whose followers you want to interact
add this argument to select an amount of users from the interact-list (users are randomized). It can be a number (e.g. 4) or a range (e.g. 3-8)
use this argument in order to interact with profiles from targets.txt
add this argument in order to just scrape targeted profiles for an account. The scraped profiles names will be added to targets.txt file at target account dir
add this argument to select an amount of users from the interact-list (users are randomized). It can be a number (e.g. 4) or a range (e.g. 3-8)
